TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MouseButtonEventHandler(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed MouseButtonEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MouseButtonEventHandler(sender As Object, e As MouseButtonEventArgs)
public delegate void MouseButtonEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, MouseButtonEventArgs ^ e);
type MouseButtonEventHandler = delegate of obj * MouseButtonEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理与鼠标按钮相关的路由事件的方法，例如 。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle mouse button related routed events, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托与以下附加事件一起使用。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - - - - - - 此委托与以下路由事件一起使用。This delegate is used with the following routed events. 这些路由事件转发前面列出的附加事件, 使其更易于访问中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的常规元素模型。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - - - - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据, 路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序更改事件源的背景色。The following example creates a event handler that changes the background color of the source of the event. 背景色取决于按下的按钮。The background color is determined by which button is pressed. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargschangedbutton)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargschangedbutton)]
